name: Trump Vineyard Estates (Formerly Eric Trump Land Holdings)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of Trump Vineyard Estates LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $100,001 - $1,000,000 in rent income from TRUMP VINEYARD ESTATES LLC, valued at $5,000,001 - $25,000,000. Underlying Assets: vineyard. Location: Charlottesville, VA. See attached schedule.

Former president of Trump Vineyard Estates Lot 3 Owner LLC (F/K/A Eric Trump Land Holdings LLC), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $100,001 - $1,000,000 in rent income from TRUMP VINEYARD ESTATES LOT 3 OWNER LLC, valued at $500,001 - $1,000,000. Underlying Assets: vineyard. Location: Charlottesville, VA. See attached schedule.
familyMemberEthics.business: Trump Vineyard Estates Lot 3 Owner LLC (F/K/A Eric Trump Land Holdings LLC)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/director/chairman of Trump Vineyard Estates Manager Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

ethics.conflict: Trump Vineyard Estates (Formerly Eric Trump Land Holdings)
